QueryList.Join: <%if(has(id)){%> AND id=:id <%}%> <%else if (has(id_not)){%> and A.id <> :id_not <%}%> <%else if (has(id_li)){%> and A.id like '%'||:id_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(phone)){%> AND phone=:phone <%}%> <%else if (has(phone_not)){%> and A.phone <> :phone_not <%}%> <%else if (has(phone_li)){%> and A.phone like '%'||:phone_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(remark)){%> AND remark=:remark <%}%> <%else if (has(remark_not)){%> and A.remark <> :remark_not <%}%> <%else if (has(remark_li)){%> and A.remark like '%'||:remark_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(contact)){%> AND contact=:contact <%}%> <%else if (has(contact_not)){%> and A.contact <> :contact_not <%}%> <%else if (has(contact_li)){%> and A.contact like '%'||:contact_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(tenantName)){%> AND tenantName=:tenantName <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantName_not)){%> and A.tenantName <> :tenantName_not <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantName_li)){%> and A.tenantName like '%'||:tenantName_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(orderby)) {%> ORDER BY A.${orderby} <%if (has(sort)){%> ${sort} <%}else{%> ASC <%}%> <%}%>
